readers.type: Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Content.DictionaryReader`2[[System.String, mscorlib, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b77a5c561934e089],[System.String, mscorlib, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b77a5c561934e089]]

content.40/f Elliott 1000/p Gus/t 1500 2200: playful/11 20/farmer 14 24 0 Elliott -30 -30 0 Clint 18 22 2 Marnie 9 22 3 Pam 7 18 1 Lewis 8 22 1 Pierre 4 22 2 Demetrius 3 23 1 Gus 14 18 2 Emily 16 18 3/skippable/move farmer 0 -3 3/faceDirection Pierre 1 true/move farmer -3 0 0/faceDirection Pierre 2 true/move farmer 0 -1 0/faceDirection Marnie 0 true/faceDirection Gus 3/speak Gus "嗨，我马上就来给您点单。"/faceDirection Gus 2/move Emily 2 0 1/faceDirection Marnie 3 true/pause 800/move Emily -2 0 0/pause 1000/faceDirection Clint 3 true/move Emily 2 0 1/warp Elliott 14 24/playSound doorClose/pause 500/move Elliott 0 -3 3/faceDirection farmer 2 true/move Elliott -2 0 0/move Elliott 0 -1 0/faceDirection farmer 1/faceDirection Elliott 3/speak Elliott "您好，@!真是巧啊！#$b#我刚写了八个小时的书，想来这里休息一下。$h"/pause 400/faceDirection Elliott 1/speak Elliott "酒保！请来两杯最好的麦芽酒！^酒保！我要你们最好的麦芽酒。再给这位女士来杯葡萄酒！"/faceDirection Gus 3/faceDirection farmer 0/speak Gus "……$u"/move Gus 3 0 0/move Gus 0 -1 0/faceDirection Emily 2/playSound openBox/pause 400/playSound Milking/move Pam -6 0 0/move Gus 0 1 3/move Gus -5 0 2/faceDirection Elliott 0/pause 500/speak Gus "给您，先生。$u"/pause 500/faceDirection Elliott 3/faceDirection farmer 1/speak Elliott "$q 28376 null#等等。让我们举杯庆祝一下！为了……#$r 28376 25 event_toast4#鹈鹕镇！#$r 28376 50 event_toast2#我们的友谊！#$r 28376 -10 event_toast1#我们的健康！#$r 28376 -50 event_toast3#你的命运！"/faceDirection Elliott 2/faceDirection farmer 2/pause 900/showFrame Elliott 16/animate Elliott false false 120 16 17 18 19 19 18 18 19 19 18 18 19 19 18 18 19 19 18 18 17 16/pause 500/farmerEat 346/pause 900/pause 1100/stopAnimation farmer/faceDirection farmer 1/speak Elliott "*打嗝*……劲儿好大啊……$h"/pause 800/animate Elliott false false 400 20 21 22 21 20 21 22 21 20 21 22 21 20 21 22 21 16/pause 1000/faceDirection farmer 1/pause 800/faceDirection farmer 2/animate farmer false true 100 102 103/pause 1000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 600/stopAnimation farmer/end warpOut
content.96/f Gus 1000/f Pam 500/p Gus: jaunty/10 21/farmer -100 -100 0 Gus 10 21 2 Pam -101 -101 0/skippable/pause 200/emote Gus 28/pause 500/playSound doorClose/warp farmer 14 24/pause 500/faceDirection Gus 1 true/move farmer 0 -3 3/speak Gus "哦，哥们儿，你好。^您好，@。"/pause 500/faceDirection Gus 2/move farmer -3 0 2/pause 800/faceDirection farmer 3/pause 400/emote farmer 8/pause 700/speak Gus "*唉*……正在查看上个月的营收……情况不是很好，@。$s#$b#最麻烦的是……我不想说，因为她是我的朋友……但，都怪潘姆！她已经好几个星期没付账了！$s#$b#……我知道她会辩解，但我不想伤害她的自尊心。$s"/pause 600/faceDirection Gus 1/speak Gus "@，你得帮帮我！$s"/stopMusic/pause 500/playSound doorClose/warp Pam 14 24/move Pam 0 -3 3/faceDirection Gus 1 true/faceDirection farmer 1/emote Gus 16/speak Pam "嘿！$h#$b#格斯……我快渴死了，给我拿点儿喝的。"/emote Gus 28/speak Gus "额……好吧，潘姆。$s"/emote Gus 28/pause 700/emote Pam 8/pause 400/speak Pam "$q 207 null#@，你有什么事儿吗？#$r 207 -50 event_credit1#你现在就得把赊的账给结了！#$r 208 15 event_credit2#酒吧在经济上有些困难"/pause 400/faceDirection Pam 1/emote Pam 12/speak Pam "……$u#$b#*唉*……好吧，我觉得我最好还是把帐给结了。$s"/move Pam -2 0 0/move Pam 0 -1 3/move Pam -2 0 2/faceDirection Gus 0/faceDirection farmer 3/playSound money/pause 500/speak Gus "谢谢你，潘姆！$h"/pause 500/faceDirection Gus 1/speak Gus "还要谢谢你，@。$u"/pause 500/faceDirection Gus 0/speak Gus "潘姆，我现在就给你拿喝的。$h"/friendship Gus 50/end dialogue Gus "谢谢你的帮助，@。有了这些钱，酒吧就得救了。"
content.97/f Clint 750/t 1900 2300/d Tue Wed Thu: none/4 18/farmer 14 24 0 Clint 4 19 2 Emily 10 11 0 Gus 15 18 1 Shane 7 18 1/skippable/move farmer 0 -3 3/emote Clint 28/pause 500/move Clint 0 -1 3/move Clint -3 0 0/pause 500/playSound openBox/pause 150/playSound shiny4/pause 400/playMusic desolate/move Clint 3 0 2/move Clint 0 1 2/move farmer -3 0 0/move farmer 0 -1 3/faceDirection Shane 2 true/move farmer -3 0 3/faceDirection Shane 1 true/move farmer -3 0 3/faceDirection Clint 1/speak Clint "您好，@……要不要和我坐一起？"/pause 400/faceDirection farmer 0/pause 800/faceDirection farmer 3/faceDirection Clint 2/speak Clint "让我跟你讲讲，我在想些什么吧。$u#$b#我没有什么女人缘，@……*唉*$s#$b#但和我打过交道的人，都知道我是个好人。真的！$u"/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 0/emote farmer 28/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 3/speak Clint "女孩子似乎都很喜欢你，@……^你是个女孩儿，@……"/speak Clint "$q 211 null#你有什么秘诀吗？^你能给我一些建议吗？#$r 211 25 event_advice1#靠你的能力和魅力打动女性#$r 211 25 event_advice1#做些疯狂的事情，让别人猜不透你#$r 211 0 event_advice2#表现得正常一点儿……做你自己就好#$r 211 25 event_advice1#把女人当男人一样对待"/speed Emily 4/move Emily -6 0 2/speed Emily 2/move Emily 0 4 2/doAction 4 16/playSound openBox/stopMusic/move Emily 0 3 1/move Emily 1 0 2/move Emily 0 1 3/pause 400/pause 700/speak Emily "嗨，克林特，今晚想来点儿什么？$h"/pause 600/faceDirection Clint 1/pause 200/speak Clint "正确！"/pause 300/speak Clint "呃……我是说，请给我来个大份儿干酪。再多浇一份酱汁。$s#$b#……$u"/faceDirection Clint 3/faceDirection Emily 2/pause 300/faceDirection Clint 2/speak Emily "嗨，@。"/pause 300/faceDirection farmer 0/faceDirection Clint 1/speak Clint "额……*清嗓子*谢……谢谢，艾米丽。谢谢你……给我点单。#$b#那个，艾米丽？我……*吞口水*我在想……$h"/pause 300/faceDirection Emily 3/emote Emily 8/pause 400/speak Emily "克林特，怎么了？$u"/pause 500/emote Clint 28/pause 1200/speak Clint "…… 算了，没什么。$s"/faceDirection Clint 0/playMusic sadpiano/pause 300/faceDirection Emily 2/pause 300/faceDirection Emily 3/pause 500/move Emily 0 -1 1/move Emily 1 0 1/faceDirection Shane 3/speak Emily "嗨，谢恩！这是你的饮料。$h"/pause 300/faceDirection Shane 1/pause 400/addObject 8 17 346 1/playSound woodyStep/pause 400/faceDirection Shane 3/pause 300/faceDirection Clint 1/speak Shane "谢谢，艾米丽！$h#$b#那么……这会儿忙吗？"/speak Emily "还好！谢谢你的关心，谢恩！$h#$b#你有新的小鸡故事吗？"/pause 600/emote Clint 28/pause 500/faceDirection Clint 2/pause 800/speak Clint "*唉*$s#$b#我没救了……$s"/end warpOut
content.911526/f Alex 2500/t 1900 2200/n joshMes: gusviolin/-1000 -1000/farmer 5 5 1 Gus 10 6 2 Alex 9 5 3 Emily 9 17 2/skippable/showFrame 117/showFrame Alex 39/positionOffset farmer 12 8/positionOffset Alex -12 0/animate Gus false true 723 16 17/viewport 7 4 true/pause 23000/stopAnimation Gus/pause 1000/faceDirection Gus 3/speak Alex "谢谢你，格斯。这太棒了。"/move Gus 0 1 1/move Gus 1 0 2/move Gus 0 1 2/doAction 11 9/move Gus 0 3 1/move Gus 12 0 3 true/speak Alex "这里真不错……我从没在这儿吃过饭。"/pause 1000/emote Alex 40/speak Alex "嗯，总之……我预订了这个包间，是为了和你聊聊……$l"/warp Emily 11 11 true/playSound woodyStep/move Emily 0 -4 3/move Emily -4 0 0/move Emily 0 -1 0/speak Emily "我端来了@先生的扁面条配奶油蘑菇酱。^这是女士点的蔬菜汤和胡桃沙拉。#$b#……还有亚历克斯的烤牛排。^还有这位先生的烤牛排。"/playSound woodyHit/specificTemporarySprite joshDinner/speak Alex "谢谢。"/move Emily 4 0 2/move Emily 0 5 1/move Emily 11 0 1 true/speak Alex "那么，我想说的就是……$9"/playMusic musicboxsong/speak Alex "*咽口水*$s"/pause 600/speak Alex "那个……第一次见到你的时候，我就被你吸引了。我有点儿不好开口……但我从没对别人有过这种感觉。$l^第一次见到你的时候，我就觉得你好漂亮。$l#$b#我一直在告诉自己“你不能对别的男孩儿有这种感觉”。$l^一般情况下，就算我对某人动了心，那种感觉很快也会冷却……$l"/pause 800/speak Alex "……但我的内心有不同的看法。^……但对你的感觉却越来越强。$l"/pause 400/emote Alex 40/pause 600/question fork1 "#我再赞同不过了。#抱歉……我对你没感觉。"/pause 400/fork rejectJosh/speak Alex "……$l#$b#我不敢相信，对彼此说出这番话，居然要花这么长时间。$l"/emote Alex 32/pause 800/animate Alex false false 400 40 41 41 40 41 41 40 41 41 40 41 41 40/pause 800/playSound eat/pause 800/playSound eat/pause 800/playSound eat/pause 800/playSound gulp/pause 400/speak Alex "嗯……这块牛排好棒。你能闻到香辣酱的味道吗？$10"/eyes 1 -4000/animate Alex false false 400 40 41 41 40 41 41 40/pause 1000/specificTemporarySprite alexDiningDog/playSound dogWhining/pause 1000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 6000/end dialogue Alex "……$l"
content.rejectJosh: pause 100/playMusic none/shake Alex 2000/emote Alex 28/speak Alex "……噢……$s#$b#如……如果让你不舒服了的话真是抱歉……$s"/pause 2000/speak Alex "我已经不饿了……$s"/viewport move 1 1 5000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 4000/end dialogue Alex "……$l"
content.195099/f Shane 2500/f Sebastian 2500/f S: playful/-1000 -1000/farmer 27 19 1 Sam 36 20 1 Sebastian 37 19 2 Harvey 39 19 2 Shane 40 17 2 Elliott 41 19 2 Alex 42 20 3/animate Shane false true 200 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 21 22 23 24 24 24 24 23 22 21 20 20 20 20/pause 1000/message "出于某些原因，你决定把手放到口袋里……"/pause 500/message "你摸着兔子的脚，感觉如释重负……"/move farmer 5 0 1 true/viewport 37 19 true/move false/pause 500/faceDirection Sam 3 true/faceDirection Elliott 3 true/faceDirection Harvey 3 true/faceDirection Alex 3 true/faceDirection Shane 3 true/faceDirection Sebastian 3 true/textAboveHead Sam "嘿！"/textAboveHead Alex "最近好吗？"/textAboveHead Shane "哦，你好"/pause 2000/move farmer 3 0 1/emote farmer 32/pause 500/speak Harvey "你来得正是时候，刚好赶上鹈鹕镇第一届八球锦标赛！"/pause 500/speak Elliott "别担心，我以前也没玩过。$h"/pause 500/speak Shane "很简单的，你只管猛击母球就对了……$h"/pause 500/fade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 1500/message "你和男孩们玩了一局桌球。"/pause 1000/message "毫无悬念，塞巴斯蒂安赢了……不过还是很有趣！"/pause 500/end
content.195013/f Shane 2500/f Sebastian 2500/f S: playful/-1000 -1000/farmer 27 19 1 Sam 36 20 1 Sebastian 37 19 2 Harvey 39 19 2 Shane 40 17 2 Elliott 41 19 2 Alex 42 20 3/animate Shane false true 200 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 21 22 23 24 24 24 24 23 22 21 20 20 20 20/move farmer 5 0 1 true/viewport 37 19 true/move false/pause 500/startJittering/faceDirection farmer 2 true/animate farmer false true 100 94/jump farmer/pause 2000/stopAnimation farmer/showFrame farmer 0/stopJittering/playSound thudStep/faceDirection farmer 3 true/showFrame farmer 7 true/startJittering/faceDirection Sam 3 true/faceDirection Elliott 3 true/faceDirection Harvey 3 true/faceDirection Alex 3 true/faceDirection Shane 3 true/faceDirection Sebastian 3 true/textAboveHead Sam "别跑那么快！"/textAboveHead Alex "别动！"/textAboveHead Shane "站住！"/pause 3000/stopJittering/showFrame farmer 6 true/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 1/move farmer 3 0 1/playMusic none/emote farmer 28/pause 500/speak Sam "呵，从没想过你所有的“男朋友”会出现在一个房间里吧，@？$a"/pause 500/speak Harvey "你骗取了我们所有人的爱……你真是太可怕了……$s^@……我还以为你想要和我结婚，共同组建家庭……我到底做错了什么？$s"/pause 500/speak Shane "我最后仅存的希望的碎片也彻底被毁了……可真得谢谢你啊，@。你现在高兴了吗？$s"/pause 500/speak Alex "@？我以为……我以为我们是“彼此的唯一”……你却只是在利用我？$s^你盯着*我*看什么？你以为我会来救你？$a"/pause 500/speak Elliott "唯独这次，我竟无言以对……$a"/pause 500/playMusic wedding/speak Sam "我们不会再忍受你的伤害了！$a^现在，我们都知道真相了！我们不会容忍这种事情！$a"/textAboveHead Alex "没错！"/pause 500/speak Sebastian "嗯？你还有什么要为自己辩解的？$a"/pause 1000/question fork1 "#对不起……我以前做错了。#各位，冷静一下！我可以解释……"/fork choseToExplain/pause 500/textAboveHead Alex "当然……"/pause 500/speak Shane "说得好听，但这事不能就这么算了……$a"/pause 1000/playMusic none/speak Sam "……我们已经决定了……对吗，伙伴们？$u"/pause 500/speak Harvey "……是的。$s"/speak Elliott "当然。$a"/pause 1000/jump Sam/jump Sebastian/jump Elliott/jump Shane/jump Alex/jump Harvey/pause 1000/speak Sam "我们都要疏远你！$a"/faceDirection farmer 2 true/animate farmer false true 100 94/jump farmer/playSound slimedead/pause 2000/fade/viewport -2000 -2000/dump guys 3/end warpOut
content.choseToExplain: pause 100/textAboveHead Shane "我深表怀疑……"/pause 500/resetVariable/question fork2 "#你们所有人都在逼我！让我说不出“不”！#皮埃尔向我施压！他想卖出更多花束！#（开始哭）"/pause 100/fork crying/textAboveHead Sam "骗子！"/textAboveHead Alex "对，没错！"/speak Elliott "不要把自己的错误归咎在别人身上！你只会继续失去我们的尊重……$a"/pause 1000/faceDirection Sam 2/playMusic none/speak Sam "……我想我们已经决定了……对吗，男孩们？$u"/pause 500/speak Harvey "……是的。$s"/speak Sebastian "当然。$a"/faceDirection Sam 3/pause 1000/jump Sam/jump Sebastian/jump Elliott/jump Shane/jump Alex/jump Harvey/pause 1000/jump Sam/jump Sebastian/jump Elliott/jump Shane/jump Alex/jump Harvey/pause 1000/jump Sam/jump Sebastian/jump Elliott/jump Shane/jump Alex/jump Harvey/pause 1000/speak Sam "我们都要疏远你！$a"/faceDirection farmer 2 true/animate farmer false true 100 94/jump farmer/playSound slimedead/pause 2000/fade/viewport -2000 -2000/dump guys 4/end warpOut
content.crying: pause 100/faceDirection farmer 0/emote farmer 28/pause 1000/emote Harvey 12 true/emote Sebastian 12 true/emote Shane 12 true/emote Sam 12 true/emote Elliott 12 true/emote Alex 12 true/speak Harvey "没用的！这次别想再骗取我们的同情了！$a"/speak Alex "在我看来你只是又演了一场戏……$a^一如既往……$a"/pause 100/speak Sebastian "你需要为自己做过的事负责……$a"/pause 1000/faceDirection Sam 2/playMusic none/speak Sam "……我想我们已经决定了……对吗，男孩们？$u"/pause 500/speak Harvey "……是的。$s"/speak Sebastian "当然。$a"/faceDirection Sam 3/pause 1000/jump Sam/jump Sebastian/jump Elliott/jump Shane/jump Alex/jump Harvey/pause 1000/jump Sam/jump Sebastian/jump Elliott/jump Shane/jump Alex/jump Harvey/pause 1000/jump Sam/jump Sebastian/jump Elliott/jump Shane/jump Alex/jump Harvey/pause 1000/speak Sam "我们都要疏远你！$a"/faceDirection farmer 2 true/animate farmer false true 100 94/jump farmer/playSound slimedead/pause 2000/fade/viewport -2000 -2000/dump guys 4/end warpOut
content.wewereworried: emote farmer 40/faceDirection Marnie 1/pause 1000/faceDirection Shane 2/emote Shane 12/speak Shane "我是你的丈夫……你应该相信我。我一直对你坦诚地告诉你我的问题。$a#$b#那个……我知道我还没从强行戒酒瘾中缓过来……但是，我在努力做到最好……而且我也健康多了。#$b#我的生活已经比以前好太多了。我已经不在阴暗的地方了……"/pause 500/emote Marnie 20 true/emote farmer 20 true/pause 1300/faceDirection Shane 0/speak Shane "说起来，我玩这个游戏的时候，我会专注到没心思想别的事情。当我有“冲动”的时候这确实很有帮助……"/faceDirection Shane 2/speak Shane "总之……我就……呃……再玩一局就回家。行吗？"/pause 500/emote farmer 32/pause 1000/end dialogue Shane "你们刚才进来看到我在街机前面的时候，肯定很疑惑吧！$h"
content.3917590/n saloonSportsRoom/O Alex: distantBanjo/-100 -100/farmer 31 20 0 Alex 32 7 0 Shane 33 8 0 Gus 34 8 0 Kent 35 8 0 George 36 7 0/skippable/specificTemporarySprite gridballGameTV/viewport 34 7 true/move farmer 0 -13 1 true/pause 1000/textAboveHead Alex "干得好！"/pause 600/jump Gus/pause 2000/textAboveHead George "进球！"/pause 400/textAboveHead Alex "走起来！"/faceDirection Kent 3 true/faceDirection Gus 1 true/animate Gus false true 100 22/animate Kent false true 100 17/shake Gus 500/shake Kent 500/pause 500/textAboveHead George "好样的！"/pause 1000/stopAnimation Gus/stopAnimation Kent/faceDirection Kent 0 true/faceDirection Gus 0/pause 1000/faceDirection Alex 3/pause 400/speak Alex "嘿，@！你做到了！$h"/faceDirection Alex 1/speak Alex "所以……你觉得呢？"/pause 500/emote farmer 8/faceDirection Alex 3/speak Alex "我一直在想……你知道我以前经常梦想有一天成为运动员吗？#$b#唔，最终结果是跟我想的有些不一样……$9#$b#不过别误会了！我还是很开心的！$h#$b#……但是我觉得如果能有一个地方可以让我们一起在外头看周日的比赛会很酷。格斯非常喜欢这个主意，他把他房子的里屋分出来一部分给我了！#$b#这样，我就可以用简单的办法，让我的“梦想”一直保持。"/pause 500/emote farmer 32/pause 600/faceDirection George 3/speak George "你做得很好，儿子。我本来是可以在家里看的，但来这里让我感觉自己又年轻了！$h"/faceDirection Alex 1/speak Alex "谢谢，爷爷。"/pause 500/speak Kent "我很高兴能有个借口离开家，让我能够喘口气。"/faceDirection Alex 2/pause 100/textAboveHead Shane "我也一样"/pause 1200/speak Gus "我很开心。而且它对生意也有好处！$h#$b#虽然可能对谢恩的肝脏不太好……$s"/pause 100/faceDirection Shane 2 true/animate Shane false true 100 18/jump Shane/pause 500/textAboveHead Shane "嘿！"/pause 500/emote Alex 32/pause 2000/fade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 400/message "看来他们有了一个新的星期天常规活动。"/pause 1000/message "5,000 金花得很值！"/pause 1000/end dialogue Alex "再次感谢你的出资，@。对我来说这是一个有趣的项目，并且看起来大伙都很高兴！"
content.3206194/n gusGiantOmelet: distantBanjo/-1000 -1000/farmer -100 -100 02 Gus 10 21 2 Willy 13 21 3 Lewis 8 22 1 Robin 9 20 2 Pam 11 20 2 Marnie 9 23 0/skippable/specificTemporarySprite staticSprite LooseSprites\\Cursors2 145 193 32 28 10 20.75 8 .15/viewport 11 21 true/pause 3000/speak Gus "唔，伙计们……我们这次聚在一起又是因为一个很特殊的情况。"/pause 500/speak Gus "……一位好朋友难得到访……"/pause 500/jump Gus/pause 400/speak Gus "……它就是我举世闻名的巨型煎蛋卷！$h#$b#爽口的甜椒、多汁的番茄、口感丰富的蘑菇、香浓的芝士……全部包裹在香软的煎蛋里。来吃吧，伙计们。"/move Marnie 1 0 0/move Willy -1 0 3/move Lewis 1 0 1/showFrame Lewis 28/playSound coin/showFrame Willy 32/showFrame Robin 37/showFrame Pam 36/pause 600/shake Lewis 600/playSound eat/pause 600/shake Pam 600/playSound eat/pause 800/shake Robin 600/playSound eat/pause 600/shake Pam 400/playSound eat/pause 700/faceDirection Gus 1/speak Gus "威利？你觉得如何？"/pause 400/textAboveHead Willy "唔……"/pause 700/shake Willy 400/playSound eat/pause 600/shake Willy 400/playSound eat/pause 600/speak Willy "蘑菇比去年的更有嚼劲一点……"/pause 400/speak Gus "你觉得好吃吗？$s"/pause 400/playSound eat/shake Willy 400/pause 600/playSound eat/shake Willy 400/pause 600/playSound eat/shake Willy 400/pause 800/playSound gulp/pause 1300/textAboveHead Willy "嗯，小伙子"/pause 300/jump Gus/pause 400/emote Gus 32/pause 1000/speak Pam "很棒啊，格斯。而且因为不收钱，味道更好了！$h"/faceDirection Gus 2/speak Robin "鸡蛋口感很棒，颜色也是金黄金黄的……玛妮，是你家里的吗？"/faceDirection Gus 3/speak Gus "不是……你得感谢%farm农场的@！"/emote Lewis 20 true/emote Marnie 20 true/emote Robin 20 true/emote Pam 20 true/emote Willy 20 true/pause 1000/speak Marnie "嗯……%farm的鸡蛋。"/pause 200/textAboveHead Lewis "嗯……"/faceDirection Gus 2/viewport move 1 0 7000/pause 500/playSound eat/shake Robin 400/pause 1000/playSound eat/shake Lewis 400/pause 1000/playSound eat/shake Marnie 400/pause 1000/fade/viewport -1000 -1000/end
